Admiral.Title: Gowron
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: If there is not already a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship, place 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship. In addition, if your ship is a Klingon ship with a Klingon Captain assigned to it, you may immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: If there is not already a [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship, place 1 [BATTLESTATIONS] Token beside your ship. In addition, if your ship is a Klingon ship with a Klingon Captain assigned to it, you may immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.

Admiral.Title: Liviana Charvanek
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: If your ship has the [CLOAK] ACTION on its Action Bar, place a [CLOAK] Token beside your ship then immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: If your ship has the [CLOAK] ACTION on its Action Bar, place a [CLOAK] Token beside your ship then immediately perform an additional Action from your Action Bar as a free Action.
